about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Building trust and excellence in every project since 2015.
about.story_p1: Founded in 2015 in Radès, Tunisia, JOMANA TRAVAUX started with a clear vision: to raise the standard of residential construction in the region. What began as a small team of dedicated craftsmen has grown into a reputable construction company known for quality, reliability, and attention to detail.
about.story_p2: Over the past few years, we have successfully delivered numerous projects, ranging from modern villas to complex renovations. Our growth is a testament to the trust our clients place in us and our unwavering commitment to excellence.
about.mission_desc: Our mission is simple: to build high-quality houses, villas, and residential projects that stand the test of time. We believe that a home is more than just bricks and mortar; it's a sanctuary where memories are made.
about.founder_desc: With a passion for construction and a vision for modern living, Mohamed Belhaj established JOMANA TRAVAUX to bring a fresh perspective to the Tunisian construction industry. His hands-on approach and dedication to quality ensure that every project meets the highest standards.
